ai-tha-ap171:2.3_0: We shall build a schism in the Sangha,
ai-tha-ap171:3.1_0: and they agree to do what
ai-tha-ap171:3.3_0: and hung it to a conclusion,
ai-tha-ap171:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap171:5.1_0: if she transfers one that is less than two;
ai-tha-ap171:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap171:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable advised.
ai-tha-ap171:8.1_0: The ninth part of the senior monks is applied.
